title: Prostration of recitation (sujood al tilawah) mandatory everytime when memorizing Quran Assimalhakee
transcript: and somaya says while memorizing a verse containing sujud prostration do i need to go for sujud each time i read or say it the answer is no this is not mandatory and even if you deliberately skip it not while memorizing it rather but while reciting it there's no sin in that insha allah you
